column5: I've been accessing Long Point Bay from the Provincial Park launch but Port Ryerse is quite a bit closer to my home.  Does anyone know if they have a boat launch? If they do can you comment on condition, private, public, etc.  TIA.
No ramp there, sorry. The closest launch is the Port Dover Yaught Club on the east side of the pier. Ryerse is unprotected. If there is a private ramp there I haven't seen it.
